description: ShadowScope ontology packs for keyword/regex tagging. Keep weights 4-12. Prefer specificity; down-weight high-noise terms.

packs.name: Radiological/Nuclear
Space launch operations
Propulsion / advanced materials
NASA / space centers
AFOSI / PJ program protection, insider threat, and FBI integration

rules.pattern: Air Force Office of Special Investigations

packs.name: Air Force acquisition, special programs, and Rapid Capabilities Office

rules.pattern: Department of the Air Force Rapid Capabilities Office
Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Acquisition, Technology and Logistics
Air Force Life Cycle Management Center

packs.name: Codewords, oversight statutes/directives, and high-discrimination identifiers
Contractors, FFRDC/UARC intermediaries, and acquisition signals
Contractors, FFRDCs, and management/operations entities
FFRDCs, national labs, primes, and special industrial facilities
DOE/NNSA offices, classification terms, and response/transport units
Historical organizations, AEC lineage, and defense nuclear agency evolution
Intel offices, special program control structures, and interagency nodes
Kona Blue / AAWSAP-AATIP / Contract & Solicitation Identifiers
Labs, facilities, stations, test ranges, and locations used as anchors
Labs / FFRDCs / Contractors / Corporate Transactions

rules.pattern: National Technology and Engineering Solutions of Sandia

packs.name: Lockheed / Skunk Works / Key Facilities
Nevada Test Site / NNSS / NTTR locations, areas, and air assets
NRO programs, platforms, and analytics (procurement pivots)
Organizations, contractors, FFRDCs/UARCs, and offices

rules.pattern: Los Alamos National Labs|Los Alamos National Laboratory|\bLANL\b
US Army Corps of Engineers|\bUSACE\b|core of engineers|corps of engineers
Lawrence Livermore labs|Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory|\bLLNL\b
Air Force research lab|\bAFRL\b|Aerospace Systems directorate
unitech Technologies|Hamilton standard|chemical biological agent mitigation
Rand Corporation|Project Rand|Army Air Force project Rand
\bBDM\b|deep basing communication study|Intercontinental ballistic missile deep basing

packs.name: Platforms, vessels, submarines, and specialized recovery systems
Programs, codewords, policies, directives, and named operations
Ranges, bases, and alleged legacy locations

rules.pattern: Edwards Air Force Base|\b412th\b (?:test group|test wing)|\b412\b test
Fort Hood|gray army airfield|Gray Army Airfield

packs.name: Sandia sites, facilities, and technical areas
SAP Governance / Audits / Security Controls

rules.pattern: Need for DoD inspections of special access contracts
controls over classified documents for a special access program at Lockheed Corporation
DoD special access programs administrative due process not provided when access is denied or revoked

packs.name: Sensitive activities, special programs oversight, and access arbitration
Technical collection, sensing, and recovery methods (contract-description friendly)
Technical / Funding / Measurement & Test Terms
Test & evaluation, foreign material, and Western ranges infrastructure
Test Ranges / MRTFBs / Transport & Airspace
Tunneling, underground transit (maglev/tube), power, and detection methods (plus key report titles)

rules.pattern: literature survey of underground construction methods for application to hardened facilities
design of underground installations in rock
utilization of nuclear power plants in underground installation
development of inspection and detection techniques for hidden cavities|hidden cavities
National Committee on tunneling technology|\bNCTT\b|US National Committee on tunneling technology
pulse microwave|microwave weapons|EMP type weapons|electronic warfare system designed to disable
deep shaft structures|incline shaft|vertical Elevator Shaft|vertical shaft
iron\s*chlorine fuel cells|fuel cells|deep ICBM bases
systems and cost analysis for a nuclear subter tunnel machine
international Society for terrain vehicle systems|\bISTVS\b

packs.name: UAP-legacy claims, program labels, and technical hooks (high specificity, varying credibility)
UAP legacy program terms, codewords, and operational phrases
Underground facilities, continuity sites, and command centers

rules.pattern: \bDUC\b|deep underground Command Center|National Underground Command Center
CIA directorate of Science and Technology|\bDS&T\b
Warrington|Warrenton US army training center|federal reloc\w+ Center
